ovdesc.p: The Customer Status codes defined in this table are assigned to Customer records of T24 to enable the bank to classify their Customers on any kind of criteria defined locally.
This enables standard codes to be used when there is a requirement to highlight specific information relating to Customer, for example, "Customer Deceased" or "Customer In Jail" etc.

desc.p: This is the code by which the Customer Status can be identified.
1-4 numeric characters. (Mandatory input) The code must be in the range of 1 - 9999, and represents the ID of the table.
Describes the Customer Status code and is used for enrichment of the Code.

This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter the description of the Customer Status code in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language as defined in the LANGUAGE table (Ref: GENERAL TABLES) and will indicate to the User the Language in which the Description must be entered.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. Multivalue field. (Mandatory input)
Describes the Customer Status in an abbreviated form, which can be used for reporting when space is limited.

This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter a short description of the customer Status Code in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new Language as defined in the LANGUAGE table (Ref: GENERAL TABLES) and will indicate to the User the Language in which this short description must be entered.
3-15 type AA (alphanumeric, first character alpha) characters. Multilanguage field. Multivalue field. (Mandatory input)
